tweet_text:
@SassOfficial @HeidiBriones @westbrook348 The true cause of the duopoly rule is that, in a polarized society (like ours), there's no way to express support for a centrist while having a polarized candidate as a back-up

The center squeeze scenario in RCV only happens when the 2 polarized ends have extreme support
